content: h-bunny pattern by @knot in_time free pattern pattern tester appreciation @juliascrochetgarden on instagram @her_cherry_business on instagram @1 crochet loop on instagram by @knot in_time materials yarn i used color changing embroidery thread and a little bit of black to embroider the face hook 2mm keychain optional feel free to use stuffing any hook size and stitch markers yarn type scissors yarn needle the size of the finished bunny when using the indicated materials is about 9cm stitch abbreviations the pattern is written in us therms and worked in the round magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet st - stitch chain - chain increase - increase fo - fasten_off round - round happy crocheting by @knot in_time arms make 2 round 1 make 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 2 - 5 single_crochet 6 6 fo ears make 2 round 1 make 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase around 12 round 3 - 9 single_crochet 12 fo only the 1st ear don t fo the 2nd ear body round 1 chain 2 from the 2nd ear join in the 1st ear it counts as stitch single_crochet 11 in 1st ear single_crochet 2 in chain single_crochet 12 in 2nd ear 28 round 2 - 12 single_crochet 28 28 fo by @knot in_time fold the arms in half and sew them closed then attach them on the side of round 5 of the body and begin stuffing fold the end of the body and count 10 sts put then a stitchmarker through both sides do the same on the other side here we will attach the legs legs round 1 attach new yarn to one side of the body where the legs go single_crochet 10 10 when you arrive on the other side of the body pinch the two sides togheter to crochet in the round round 2 - 8 single_crochet 10 10 stuff the leg fo and sew closed repeat also for the 2nd leg fo sew closed and leave a long tail by @knot in_time finishing touches with the long tail from the leg close the gap of the body by weaving with the yarn needle through both sides of the body 4 sts in total on the back side of one ear or of the body you can attach a keychain eyes and nose embroider the eyes on round 3-5 of the body 6 sts apart embroider the nose between the eyes 3 sts by @knot in_time thank you for making this pattern i made this pattern for free and would appreciate it if you credit me as the designer this pattern is for personal use but you can sell the finished products while indicating me as designer of the pattern you can not sell redistribute or hevily copy this pattern by rebecca from @knot in_time follow me on instagram @knot in_time ravelry rebby13
